idea-plugin.name: Pacqit for IDEA
idea-plugin.description:
Pacqit is a java project manager comparable to Maven or Gradle, but in a visual and intuitive way, working with simple terms and hardly requiring the user to edit configuration files.
With Pacqit in addition to creating java projects you can:
- Create and manage complex modules
- Index and manage all dependencies saved on your computer
- Automate compilation and construction of classes
- Automatically hide projects
- Work with polyglot programming (using CoffeeMoon and JASMB).

Pacqit for IDEA makes using Pacqit inside IDEA easy by allowing you to manage all Pacqit tools directly from the IDE.
If you want to learn more about how Pacqit works, visit: github.com/SrBalbucio/Pacqit
